name: Lost Survey
description:
The source code costs only 1$.

If you buy it, you can expand the game further and sell it comercially without paying me any other amount of money, or maybe just learn some of the effects I achieved using Ren'Py.

What you cannot do is upload the code to another website as it is without changing anything and claiming you wrote this very code. Also, the source code does not come with the fonts or the audio - if you want to use them you can download them from the links above.

You're allowed to do anything else with it.

You can credit me for making the code but that is not a requirement.

The source code was written using Ren'Py.
